revisions.author: Alessio Quagliara
revisions.note:
chore(node_transition): daily work summary â€” add docs index generator, expose docs, fix ts types, pricing UI fixes, Alpine toggle and CI workflow

Changes included:
- Added generator script scripts/generate_documentation_index.js to auto-build docs/documentation_index.json from markdown and git history.
- Added GitHub Actions workflow .github/workflows/generate-doc-index.yml to run daily and commit updates.
- Exposed docs/ as static assets in server/app.ts so frontend can fetch /docs/documentation_index.json.
- Added types/** to tsconfig.json include to pick up custom declarations (fix for express-ejs-layouts).
- Fixed Alpine pricing toggle: moved registration and wrapped hero + pricing in x-data to share billingCycle.
- Updated views/landing/pricing.ejs, home.ejs and features.ejs with darkMode-aware classes.
- Created/updated docs/documentation_index.json with public-friendly overview and revisions list.
- Misc: updated package.json and package-lock (build/dev scripts), small UI tweaks and CSS wiring.
